title: Murdered.Soul.Suspect-PROPHET
description:
Murdered: Soul Suspect  (c) Eidos Interactive            
                                                       
         release date ...: June 2767                              
         protection .....: Steam                                  
         # of discs .....: 1                                      
         languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/RU                   
         ---------------------------------------------------      
                                                                  
         Murdered: Soul Suspect is a supernatural  detective      
         thriller which challenges players to solve possibly      
         the hardest case of all... their own  murder.  When      
         Ronan O'Connor, a detective with a chequered  past,      
         gets caught up in a violent burglary, his  life  is      
         brought  to  an  untimely  end  by  a  brutal   and      
         relentless killer. Shocked to find himself  in  the      
         afterlife, his only escape from the limbo world  of      
         'Dusk' is to uncover the truth behind  his  killer,      
         track him down and bring him to justice  using  his      
         detective  instinct  and   new-found   supernatural      
         abilities.  As  Ronan,  you  have  the  freedom  to      
         explore the  modern-day  town  of  Salem:  its  New      
         England-style wooden houses, narrow streets, gothic      
         churches  and  mental  asylum  for  clues.   Battle      
         demonic spirits to save your soul and  uncover  the      
         shocking revelations about who is  responsible  for      
         your death.                                              
                                                                 
   
         1- Unpack, burn or mount                                
         2- Install the game                                     
         3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir to          
            BinariesWin64 folder                    
         4- Go To Hell!
